DOC.brief_summary: To investigate whether ingestion caffeine alter airway responsiveness methacholine and/or change level exhale nitric oxide .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Caffeine Methacholine Challenge Exhaled Nitric Oxide Levels .
DOC.criteria: clinical diagnosis asthma FEV1 great 65 % asthma poorly control presence airway disease ( e.g . COPD )
